summary: Cures any non-volatile status condition or confusion once when inflicted, then is consumed.
typical_users: Sweepers and setup Pokémon vulnerable to status (e.g., Dragonite, Garchomp)
Bulky attackers and walls to avoid being crippled (e.g., Toxapex, Clefable)
Pokémon in roles where avoiding a single status turn is critical
